data.feedback: All file paths verified via Glob/Read. Architecture follows Material Design 3 best practices. Stories correctly reference existing patterns (utility class with private constructor). No file conflicts between stories - can execute in parallel.
suggestions: Consider adding CachedNetworkImage package to pubspec.yaml for AppAvatar - Story 5 mentions it but package isn't in dependencies
Story 3 reads app_colors.dart which Story 1 creates - ensure Story 1 completes first or make Story 3 not depend on it
